Name: Brunello di Montalcino
Wine Description: Brilliant ruby, good depth, crystal line the reflections turn naturally to the grenade has a fruity and spicy bouquet, the taste is harmonious and very elegant and persistent velvety.

Name: Saggi
Wine Description: Ambrogio & Giovanni Folonari brought their knowledge and expertise to the Columbia Valley to inspire this Sangiovese-Cabernet blend that showcases focused dark cherry aromas and raspberry flavors, combined with a hint of nutmeg and smoky earthiness.

Name: Tenuta Guado al Tasso Bolgheri Superiore
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Île des Vergelesses Pernand-Vergelesses 1er Cru Rouge
Wine Description: It is great aromatic finesse on the nose, very intense, and develops scents of red fruits tending to liquorice and spices. Its structure is straight-line and tannic; it possesses great power and long persistence on the palate.

Name: Barons Edmond Benjamin de Rothschild Haut-Médoc
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Chambolle-Musigny
Wine Description: On the palate, we find grilled and fruity, very ripe cherry aromas. The tannins are present without being too intrusive or aggressive. An elegant wine, fine and pedigreed.

Name: Chambolle-Musigny
Wine Description: The wines produced are very expressive, reminiscent of red berries on a light delicate note of oak. Tender and refined, their structure has remarkable finesse without being excessively robust.

Name: Cabernet Sauvignon
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Chambolle-Musigny Vieilles Vignes
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Sorella (Champoux Vineyard)
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Savigny-lès-Beaune 1er Cru 'Aux Vergelesses' Rouge
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Pauillac (Grand Cru Classé)
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Clos Prieur Gevrey-Chambertin
Wine Description: Nice bright fruit. Cool nose with lots of funk and a floral note way late. Hint of roast pork on the nose too. Cool raspberry and hibiscus flavors on the mid palate.

Name: Katherine Lindsay Estate Pinot Noir
Wine Description: Ruby-red hued and aromatic with notes of boysenberry pie, milk cocoa and mineral, this terroir driven wine showcases the iron-rich “Sebastopol Series” Goldridge soils of our Katherine Lindsay Estate Vineyard. Flavors of cranberry, cola, and clove unfold over the palate. Fine tannins and acidity frame berry notes that persist through the long finish.

Name: Estate Cabernet Sauvignon Howell Mountain
Wine Description: This wine has an inky purple color, a beautiful nose of blueberry and blackberry fruit, licorice and spring flowers. It is complex, rich, full-bodied, opulent and lush. It is a great representation of what can be made from Howell Mountain fruit.

Name: Haut-Médoc (3éme Grand Cru Classé en 1855)
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Côte-Rôtie Côteaux de Tupin
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Duarte Vineyard Zinfandel
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Meritage
Wine Description: The palate is very refined with a nice silky lushness that does not overwhelm the senses. The tannins seem to glide along the mid-palate making the wine structured and focused, but not too fussy.

Name: Almaviva
Wine Description: Deep, intense, ruby red color with purple tones. Aromas of cassis, black berries and violet, notes of vanilla, cacao, licorice, and spices.

Name: Merlot Unfiltered
Wine Description: The aromas of this delectable Merlot are redolent of ripe blueberries and Satsuma plums with hints of violet, mocha and mint.

Name: Merlot Sonoma County
Wine Description: It has good dark color, nose of leather, black currant, and oak. Lots of dark fruit on the palate with a pleasant mouthfeel and yielding tannins; good depth of flavor, but not much complexity. Long finish. Good Merlot taste profile. Very smooth, undemanding sipping wine that would also pair well with a variety foods. A bit pricey, but this one is worth it.

Name: Cabernet Sauvignon Howell Mountain
Wine Description: It has deep black currant and black cherry, intermixed with white pepper, a touch of anisette, fresh lavender and warm red stones. The flavors are an elegant mélange of black cherry, mountain lavender, espresso bean and savory notes. Signature Howell Mountain pepper and spice enter on the mid-palate, followed by an invigorating minerality.

Name: Vieilles Vignes Chambolle-Musigny
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Peterson Family Vineyard Cabernet Sauvignon
Wine Description: Deeply concentrated and powerful with great depth, structure and beautiful balance. The flavors expand on your palate and gain intensity before they give way to a long, endless finish. A perfect combination of fruit intensity, bright acidity and silky tannin structure.

Name: Fossati Barolo
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Tanbark Hill Cabernet Sauvignon
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Malbec Argentino
Wine Description: The bold and inky Catena Zapata Malbec Argentino is a renowned Argentine wine that exemplifies the unique characteristics of Malbec, a grape variety that thrives in the region. With its unique flavor profile, predominantly of black fruit, but with earthy and oaky undertones, this wine boasts a smooth and velvety texture with well-integrated tannins, providing a satisfying and long-lasting finish. The thorough fermentation process at the Catena Zapata winery is conducted in small batches to maintain control and enhance the flavors.The wine is then aged in a combination of French and American oak barrels to add complexity and depth. Head winemaker, Alejandro Vigil, has been at Catena Zapata for over 20 years, and consistently strives to channel his creative energy into pushing the limits of conventional viticultural and winemaking wisdom. The result is a truly exceptional Malbec that stands as a testament to the artistry and expertise of Argentine winemaking. With thousands of trusted reviews, Catena Zapata Malbec Argentino is a Vivino community favorite, with one member suggesting this ‘amazing Argentine red is the smoothest I’ve ever had!’ and another naming it ‘a big fruit bomb!’ with ‘amazing juiciness!’

Name: Vosne-Romanée
Wine Description: Delicate aromas of red fruit and undergrowth. Charming and distinguished, with lovely length on the finish. Good ageing potential.

Name: Pauillac
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Chambolle Musigny
Wine Description: Dark red colour, with a great nose that takes some time to reveal the depth that is in there. On the palate the cool red fruit really shows, but I kind of feel that it is not to the full potential of course taking into account being this young. The mineral tone is there, and the balance is great! Great acidity matching those red berries, ending in a nice length on the finish. Very clean and elegant.

Name: Cuvée des Templiers Vacqueyras
Wine Description: Ruby sustained purple hues. Very aromatic and complex. The roasted aromas open on the fruit blackberry, cherry as well as the spices. Typed Syrah with plenty of material. The generosity of the fruit and elegance of the tannins characterize this wine.

Name: Amarone della Valpolicella Classico
Wine Description: Amarone Classico Bertani is a timeless wine that expresses the unique style that Bertani has always dedicatedly pursued. It is a classic style that does not need to change because it is always up-to-date. This wine has a deep garnet red colour. It presents a great variety of characters: dry fruit, liquorice and spice. It opens up in the mouth with all the red-berry fruits.

Name: Villero Barolo
Wine Description: Colour is intense ruby red with a light presence of orange reflections. The smell is elegant, intense, pleasant , balanced and with a hint of withered roses, plums, minerals, tobacco,smoke and leather. The taste is full bodied, balanced and velvety, with a huge structure and a very long finish.

Name: Claret
Wine Description: Ripe black cherry and toasty French oak aromas open with hints of menthol and lavender. The mid palate is elegantly even and beautifully balanced, allowing the flavors to coat the mouth and linger long in the finish.

Name: Pavillon Rouge du Château Margaux
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Brunello di Montalcino Riserva Pian di Conte
Wine Description: Deep red color , complex aroma fresh and rich hints of ripe red fruit , plum , cherry blackberries and raspberries , who join the spices of aging such as chocolate, tobacco and liquorice.

Name: Cabernet Sauvignon
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Côte de Nuits-Villages
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Morey Saint Denis
Wine Description: A lovely village burgundy nose of spice and white pepper and ripe red fruit. Very smooth fruit on the palate with just enough balanced tannins to make it memorable.

Name: Collina
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Herold Brown Label Cabernet Sauvignon
Wine Description: "Dramatic, dark and penetrating immediately describe this wine. The color is a deeply saturated purple-black hue. A brooding landscape of layered scents; roasted black raspberries, dusty plums and currants with subtle nuances of créme de cassis, creamy minerals, violets, sandalwood and fresh suede. A big, expansive entry gives way to abundant fine-toothed tannins that harmonize well with this badboy's richness and concentration. A deliciously long finish will deliver the goods for another 20 + years." 100% Cabernet Sauvignon

Name: Cuvée Rioja
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Macán
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Estate Pinot Noir
Wine Description: Intense of vibrant ruby purple-tinged color is followed by a youthful, fruit-filled bouquet of plums, blackberries, violets and exotic spices. Medium to full-bodied, silky and seamless on the palate.

Name: Cannubi Barolo
Wine Description: Garnet-red in color with ruby reflections. Intense perfume with clean scent of roses, vanilla, licorice, spices and toasted oak. Gentle notes of absinth. The flavor is full and elegant, good-bodied and austere with recurring olfactory sensations. The spicy note and the hints of wood blend perfectly.

Name: Georges De Latour Private Reserve Cabernet Sauvignon
Wine Description: It has aromas of crushed blackberries, dark cherries, bittersweet chocolate and violet. The elegant dark-fruit flavors, supported by firm, supple tannins, pick up distinctive minerality on the palate.

Name: Saffredi
Wine Description: Impenetrable ruby red, a beautiful density in the glass. The scents go from red fruits, red currant, blackberries and spices such as cloves, cinnamon and chocolate. In the palate the wine is well-rounded and velvety, engaging all senses with majestic balance. The long persistence allows to fully enjoy the aromatic complexity, in which the spiciness is prevalent.

Name: Memorious Pinot Noir
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Beaune 1er Cru 'Les Vignes Franches'
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Purple Angel
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Côte-Rôtie Rose Pourpre
Wine Description: Fuller-bodied than the other Côte-Rôties from Gaillard, but still fairly gentle and restrained. Keener acidity and more tannin too. Very pure red fruits, some florality and fresh earth. Gentle, seductive, silky with a hint of pepper and spice. Good length. 2016 to 2023.

Name: Jentoft Vineyard Ryan Pinot Noir
Wine Description: Beautifully elegant aromatic wine, lots of spicy primary fruit, juicy and perfumed. Black cherry, plum and boysenberry then graphite, mint and tarragon complexity. Bing cherry darkens to cassis and elderberry on the fruit-driven palate. Succulent and deeply flavored. Plush mouth feel, lilting flavors span the entire length of the wine. Plum and apple skin finish with silky tannins and good acid lift. Decant for an hour in its youth and drink between 2016 and 2022.

Name: Tenuta Nuova Brunello di Montalcino
Wine Description: To the nose it has balsamic and red fruit notes, while in the mouth it shows itself with ripen and silky tannins which are supported by a vibrant finish.

Name: Volnay Premier Cru
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Old Vines Cabernet Sauvignon
Wine Description: Flavors of black cassis/black fruit blend beautifully with the exotic spice of new oak. The texture is soft but firm with integrated tannins offering a rich, lingering finish.

Name: Cabernet Sauvignon
Wine Description: Complex and intense with aromas of ripe blackberry, raspberry and fig exploding from the glass. Rich fruit aromas are balanced by the smells of roast beef, clove, nutmeg and toffee. On the finish cedar and plum-tobacco linger tantalizingly before giving way to flavors of cherry, currant and cocoa.

Name: Clos Solon Vieilles Vigne Morey St. Denis
Wine Description: Intense, forward, full-bodied flavors of cherry liqueur, minerals, pepper, and scorched earth. Long, perfumey finish with a little heat and tannin in the back end.

Name: Reserve Cabernet Sauvignon
Wine Description: N/A
